resources.string: Where the robot expressions are drawn

This is a PET application. It makes the robot behave like a pet. A behavior module allows it to show expressions and behave accordingly. Additionally has a face-tracking and text-to-speech modules to be able to interact with the environment.\nTry to stand where the phone camera can see you.\nhttp://www.wheelphone.com
Sorry, the application could not initialize the camera. It is required for this application to work.
